chapter.title: How to contribute to the OpenEngSB .Net IDE project?
chapter.para: If you have a good idea for the improvement of the OpenEngSB .Net IDE project, please feel free to contact us on the developer mailing list.

The guidelines for the development of the OpenEngSB .Net IDE correspond to the guidelines for the development of the OpenEngSB. Therefore everyone who wants to contribute to the OpenEngSb .Net IDE, should read the contribution section of the OpenEngSB manual.

The OpenEngSB issue tracker can be used to file issue, bugs or other problems. Furthermore it is a great entry point for developers, who want to contribute, as they can browse the issues and find out in which direction the OpenCIT will develop in the future.
If there are any further questions about the development process for the OpenEngSB .Net IDE, please feel free to contact the OpenEngSB .Net IDE developer team through the mailing list.
